name: Double Pork
description:
This game is modified based on LazyDev's roguelike tutorial —— one of the best roguelike tutorial in the community. (Thank you Krystman!)

Now you have a team in the dunguon. Each of them has their own unique ability but has fewer hp at the beginning of the game. (So now is even harder) Try to find and rescure more team members in the dunguon!

Source Code is [here](https://github.com/lychees/pico8-workshop).
